name: Territorial Tug-of-War
description:
Nature vs Technology

Play as the Technology side (right) as you press arrow keys in quick succession to complete all the rounds and pull the Nature side (left) closer and into your territory. This is no easy feat however as your opponent is incredibly strong and is consistently pulling you towards their side whilst you try to resist!

Created in 48 hours as part of Global Game Game 2022 by:

  • Martin Dimovski - @Cykonai_dev - Programming
  • Morgan Thomas - @catastronaut - Artwork
  • Chloe Halikias - @SoftCircuitry - 3D Modelling
  • Bon Chau - @hiliterpi - Programming

Note: The current version does not have any audio. An update will be pushed to fix this soon!
